description: Extracts entities and relationships from text.

input_variables.name: maxTripletsPerChunk
input_variables.description: Maximum number of triplets to extract.

input_variables.name: entityTypes
input_variables.description: Types of entities to start with.

input_variables.name: relationTypes
input_variables.description: Types of relations to start with.

input_variables.name: text
input_variables.description: Text to extract the entities and relationships from.
